Package imusim :: Package simulation :: Module base :: Class Simulation

Class Simulation

source code

Main IMUSim simulation environment.

Nested Classes
  ProgressMonitor
Simple process to print status and remaining simulation time at 5% progress intervals.

(Constructor)

source code 

Initialise simulation.

Parameters:
  • seed - Seed value for np.random.RandomState.
  • environment - Environment to simulate in.
  • engine - SimPy.Simulation subclass to drive simulation.

run(self, endTime, printProgress=True)

source code 

Advance the simulation up to the given time.

Parameters:
  • endTime - Simulation time at which to stop (float).
  • printProgress - Whether to print progress information (bool).
